alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 3:32AM AKST until February 05 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM AKST THIS EVENING FROM DILLINGHAM NORTH AND EAST... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Reduced visibilities to one-half mile. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, from Dillingham north and east. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin this morning. Northerly- northeasterly winds are expected to increase by mid-to-late morning, resulting in areas of blowing snow. Winds are expected to diminish tonight, with light snow tapering off slowly through the overnight hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
